website_summaries.verdict: The beautiful design and reasonable volume make this a quality tool for inside your home.
pros: Pin requires a twist-and-pull motion to sound the alarm, preventing the pin from accidentally falling out
The alarm is loud but not deafening
Could easily be used indoors in the event of a fall or injury you can't get up from
The aesthetic design makes this alarm a discreet addition to your key chain
cons: Alarm is not quite loud enough for long distances

customer_reviews.title: Great item for more peace of mind ~
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3 pack of these--kept one & gave the other two to single, senior neighbors to have. This is very easy to use, but not so easy that it would accidentally be activated just handling it. Not knowing exactly what 120db would be, it was shockingly loud. Think louder than a smoke detector. Would encourage everyone to have one of these.
customer_reviews.author: W. Foyil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like. It give me confidence when walking my dog. I gave the others to my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: but small and pretty enough to hang on the handbag or my other
customer_reviews.text: It loud enough to attract attention, but small and pretty enough to hang on the handbag or my other keys
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Not very loud :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3 pack. I mailed 1 to my friend, gave 1 to my daughter and I kept one for myself. My daughter tested it and pulled the pin, it's not very loud and we felt it wouldn't detour an attacker. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Self defense deterant
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I like the way this looks and the sound is pretty loud. It is easy to stop the alarm if you are testing the product. I gave these as gifts and everyone was appreciative for the gift.
customer_reviews.author: S. Joscelyn

customer_reviews.title: By putting my finger over the hole where the sound was coming from it muted it pretty well. A good idea
customer_reviews.text: They're okay, I accidently kept setting it off though when I had on my keychain and twisting the key in the lock I'd sometimes end up with the pin coming loose. That was when I heard the alarm and it wasn't as loud as I thought it would be. By putting my finger over the hole where the sound was coming from it muted it pretty well. A good idea, cute design, nice to have so handy on the keyring but for me not as practical as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: K R

customer_reviews.title: EVERY woman needs one of these!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME product! It's unobtrusive, but easy to use. My husband was a police officer for 37 years, and we watch a lot of the "true crime" forensic crime shows. It's sad how many people are abducted and / or attacked in public, in full daylight as well as under cover of darkness. This product will make that impossible, or at least VERY difficult. I got one for myself, my 4 daughters, and my step daughter. THANK YOU, ANRUI!! I hope we never have to use them, but if the time comes, we'll be prepared. We will NOT go gently - or quietly!! - Kris Bice
customer_reviews.author: Kris Bice

customer_reviews.title: Good & loud, will draw attention!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2 daughters and myself because we often go walking or bicycle riding alone. I want to do all I can to feel secure when we are getting exercise. It's too scary these days to not think of ways to protect ourselves!
customer_reviews.author: ltravis1usa

customer_reviews.title: Bought this  for my  Ladies
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my ladies (Daughter and grand daughter) They might not be perfect but at least they are better than nothing they do emit a sharp alert that if one is unsuspecting could be forced to flee
customer_reviews.author: Force Recon Marine

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for those you love
customer_reviews.text: Got these as gifts for my mom, mil & gf They’re great because they’re small and can be looped onto your keys or purse or backpack... however you do have to tug hard to sound the alarm. I would imagine in an emergency you’d pull as hard as you can anyways but when I was testing them and pulled the ring I had to pull it really good to get it out...the alarm itself is very loud, it’ll definitely serve it’s purpose to scare someone off or draw attention to yourself
customer_reviews.author: Sarah  Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Personal protection alarm
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and I'm satisfied with the look and size of it. One is for me and the others are for my daughter's for Christmas. I pulled the pin on it, which is very easy to do and it is super loud.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Paananen

customer_reviews.title: dont be cheap buy better than me
customer_reviews.text: with three I was able to coble together two working units and then one got wet while my daughter was walking to school on rainy day and now that one is dead as well I recommend you look elsewhere your loved ones personal safety deserves better quality than this junk
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: These are very pretty, so it makes it very easy to have ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty, so it makes it very easy to have one anywhere: on a keychain, on a dog's leash, etc. The alarm is quite loud, so I have to believe that it would catch someone's attention quite easily. The pin fits tightly, so it's not going to accidentally slip out, but it's not so tight that it would cause any delay in pulling the pin. I kept one and gave the other two to friends, and they were very pleased with them. I hope that I won't have a need to use it, but it gives me some peace of mind when walking the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K.

customer_reviews.title: I had said on my last review nice product, good price and actually bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: out of the k6 4 ran out of battery, they have never been usedd. One failed we tested the others and 3 more failed...!!!!!! Not happy, what if I pulled in an emergency and since it is new you would assume that the battery was also new. very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: sealover

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Easier than digging in your purse for mace, take all the help we can get with so many scary things going on in the world. You pull the top pin (like a grenade) and it sounds like a super loud emergency exit door just opened up. Put the pin in and it stops. The pen is not loose so it stays in good and it would definitely surprise an attacker. Or just set it off to attract attention. It's light so you could put it on your key chain or hook it to a zipper on a purse or backpack. I took one and gave the other two to family members.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Think it will do the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my neighbor. She is 88, lives alone and recently had a very frightening experience. She keeps this with her at all times now. Hopefully she will never need it but if she does, it should at least startle any would be intruders. I do wish it was a little bit louder, but other than that it is attractive, easy to use and seems to take some punishment. I keep my second one in my purse with my keys. Third one to my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and loud.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my two granddaughters and my daughter. My son in law tried one, and they were shocked at how loud they were. You just need anything, and everything you can do, now days for protection. Such a evil world out there....
customer_reviews.author: Eyes wide openTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these peraonal alarms. Bought one for my daughter and her friends who are 19 and are out at all times of the night. Also got one for myself and my younger daughter for when she is walking home from the bus stop. It is loud enough to get noticed immediately when pulled but doesnt have an easy trigger where it constantly goes off. For the money it is well worth it. Every female and young child should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the Pin comes out of the alarm way to easy. On the first day
customer_reviews.text: the Pin comes out of the alarm way to easy. On the first day, the pin pulls out in the middle of a store.
customer_reviews.author: Pionier66

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for each of my granddaughters for Christmas. The alarms certainly make a shrill enough noise that should scare off anyone. And the design is very classy so the girls will definitely carry them
customer_reviews.author: sandyfish

customer_reviews.title: Nice LOUD sound!  Good purchase for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I will never need to use this nor my nieces whom I also gave one to. But it emits a VERY loud sound. Works well and helps to give me peace of mind. The pattern on it also makes it nice for my young nieces as they don't mind clipping it to their backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom

customer_reviews.title: Was embarrassed when  opened
customer_reviews.text: Only one works so far of the three. I bought these as gifts. One opened, she tried and it didnt work. Very embarrassing. The second one opened and it worked but it wasnt loud at all. So disappointed and embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than pepper spray I think!
customer_reviews.text: I carry one of these when walking my dog - its ear-piercing loud alarm should help call attention if I'm in a bad situation... and I won't have to aim it or worry about which way the wind is blowing....
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Dahleeng

customer_reviews.title: Small & easy to use protection!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 3 pack ‘emergency personal alarm’. Kept one for myself & gave other 2 to my Daughter & Grand daughter. We tested them together, so we knew how to use, just in case. I love the small size & that it is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniep

customer_reviews.title: No installation. No problem with knowing how to use ...
customer_reviews.text: No installation. No problem with knowing how to use it. I bought two for my daughters, my granddaughter and myself. We have one on our Keychains and one on our purses. This way we're double covered.
customer_reviews.author: lillie

customer_reviews.title: This little 'egg' packs a very loud alarm.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect alarm system for walking alone through the park. I bought the three pack, one for me and for each of my daughters. I wear it on a belt loop or pin it to my waistband for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M Miranda

customer_reviews.title: It is alarming
customer_reviews.text: When the pin comes out of this device, it is loud enough to cause a commotion. I tried using it with my keys, but grabbing them out of my bag often resulted with keys in hand and a shrieking bag, because the pin came with my keys and the device stayed in my bag. I keep the device by itself now.
customer_reviews.author: Wholly Piecemeal

customer_reviews.title: Security for me
customer_reviews.text: I truly think it’s necessary for every woman to have some kind of protection for if they’re threatened or attacked. I keep one in my purse when I walk in by myself at a store and I keep my hand on the bottom part of the rain so if somebody grabs my purse and grabs me all I have to do is pull it very easily done, once pulled it’s very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Non-toxic but effective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my two grandchildren to put on their backpacks in case they run into problems on their way home from school. They are not dangerous like mace can be, but should do the trick if help is needed. They seem to work easier if you give a little twist while pulling out the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha Christie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and had it shipped to my daughter. It is now on all key chains. My daughter said it is extremely loud. I love them having a way of attracting attention if anyone gets too close or they get scared. Thank you producers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Newman

customer_reviews.title: Extra measure of safety
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to receive this product but I hope never to have to use it. I gave one each to my daughter and daughter-in-law. They are both very happy to have this protection.
customer_reviews.author: Cajungirl

customer_reviews.title: I wear this everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I wear one on my jeans and so does my mom. They look pretty, and they are loud. I can't imagine the noise wouldn't make an attacker think twice, but even if you found yourself in a remote area, I'm guessing if you put the alarm to their ear, they'd let go of you.
customer_reviews.author: BeenThereDoneThat

customer_reviews.title: loud
customer_reviews.text: I played this few times for bunch of friends and it works! It is loud beyond wanting to hear it for loner than 2 seconds. I even accidentally separated the pieces in in the FBI parking lot and echo was waaay too much to tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: Jovana Radulovic

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This product is very loud so make sure when you test it you’re outside and not in your home. It’s really convenient to have on your keychain so when you’re walking you can just pull out the pin.
customer_reviews.author: Darienne

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product very quickly, so, shipping was great! I also love the item and have one hanging from my purse and have another one in my car and gave one to my granddaughter for safety; this is a great item to have...
customer_reviews.author: E. Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this idea. I gave one to each of my adult daughters and kept one for myself. We have them hanging on our handbags. It's loud and easy to use. I hope none of us ever have to use it but it's a comfort to know it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Really loud and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These devices are small, easy to use and really loud. They should make any attacker stop n their tracks. For those wondering about how they work. The activation method is simply, pull the key chain from the device. Reinsert to silence.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R

customer_reviews.title: This seems better than carrying pepper spray
customer_reviews.text: This seems better than carrying pepper spray. If you spray the wrong direction it is in your face! If the wind is in your direction you are getting it. This just makes a loud sound to scare someone away from you. Hope I never need to use it but it's there if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly mom
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and very helpful. My elderly mom needed something to help her feel safer. This has been great. I hope she never has to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered six of these and gave them to myself, my daughters and granddaughters. I liked them so well, I ordered more to give to my three best friends. We all feel a little more secure, but absolutely don't depend on these as our sole protection. Fortunately, none of us has had to use one yet, but we are prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 pack so I could share
customer_reviews.text: I like that this came in a 3 pack. I kept one and then gifted the other two to my daughter and daughter in law. It gives a loud alarm. It's cute and hangs nicely on one of the metal rings of my handbag.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 3
customer_reviews.text: out of the 3 in the package only one of them worked
customer_reviews.author: Connie K.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Even Last a Year
customer_reviews.text: Well, when I got it, I loved it. Thankfully never had to use it. I bought in October. Not even a year later, thing won't even work. Replaced the battery, wasted money, and it still doesn't work. Bummer. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and pin is secure
customer_reviews.text: I got one for every woman on my christmas list this year. Very loud alert and the pin stays securely in place unless you twist and pull it out. I've had it on my keychain for 3 weeks and it has not gone off by accident, which was my worry with the product.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and makes me feel safe
customer_reviews.text: I live alone. Keeping one by the bed, one hanging around the apartment like a decoration, and the last one on my purse makes me feel safe everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Li Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Gave one to my daughter and one to my sister. Could be a bit louder, but should be loud enough to attract attention.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for spooking a dog away
customer_reviews.text: I carry mine when I walk. Great for spooking a dog away. Hope I don't have to find out with a person. Easy to carry and very loud. I keep the ring on my middle finger and hold it while walking. Gave others to friends.
customer_reviews.author: lorinda bailey

customer_reviews.title: A good investment for $5 each.
customer_reviews.text: OMG! These are super loud. My only complaint is that it is semi-difficult to pull the pin from the top (good for purse travel?) and even more difficult to put back in. They are very cute. I bought them for my husband's girls for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: PERSONAL ALARM KEYCHAIN
customer_reviews.text: I KEPT ONE AND GAVE 2 AS GIFTS. WE FEEL A LOT SAFER WITH THEM. IF YOU HAVE A LOT OF KEYS ON YOUR KEYCHAIN ATTACH THIS SOMEWHERE ELSE. A HEAVY KEYCHAIN WILL MAKE THE ARLARM BE PULLED AND GO OFF. I CARRY MINE IN MY POCKET.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY SCHULTZ

customer_reviews.title: In this day and age, it's important to be ...
customer_reviews.text: In this day and age, it's important to be prepared for any possible encounter. This is a handy device to keep on your keychain to keep you safer.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Good sound. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little device. Was triggered to buy a device by FB. Went on Amazon and bought this one because of great reviews. Very pleased when it came. All my "girls" - Dtr, grand Dtr, friends. Got one
customer_reviews.author: Grammy B

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I'd say this is a good product but not great. My daughter tried it out and said it was loud but not that loud.
customer_reviews.author: CJ_Vand78

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate . Just pull the pin out to activate and place it back in to stop. It’s loud . Very pretty for a woman. Bought this so all my daughters have one.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Personal alarm it’s so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cute...so easy to use...nice and loud! hope we will never have to use one but thanks for coming out with a cute and easy to hang on a keychain .
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great gift to help keep women safe. I gave all my neices one. I wish the locket came on a more modern style.
customer_reviews.author: mark ruddell

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I will get these on sale and keep extra to give out to my teenage daughters friends. Loud and cute. I carry one while running and I think everyone should carry one.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as I thought. I'm a nurse and I get off late at night and have to walk in the garage without cameras. I tested this alert button. Not as loud as I thought, but I will still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Attractive product
customer_reviews.text: Gave several of these as gifts. Everyone was pleased to get it and remarked how pretty they looked. They are very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Ashby

customer_reviews.title: I like the size
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet, I'm a little hesitant to test it since its apparently very loud. I like the size, design and color very much. I have tried the alarm and it is a really good pitch and easy to stop.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sendra

customer_reviews.title: Accidentally pulled this in the grocery store and everyone looked ...
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally pulled this in the grocery store and everyone looked. I was embarrassed but relieved it was so loud, I know it will work when I truly need it.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and despite some of the reviews, I think it's loud enough to draw plenty of attention.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: The siren is very loud as it should be if needed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as stocking stuffers for Christmas. The girls said they are very loud and could be a deterrent which we hope will never need to be used!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Carry this when walking my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I use these alarm key chains in situations where I would be walking my dogs. Around our neighborhood or while camping. I also carry pepper spray but I would try using this loud alarm first.
customer_reviews.author: L Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Attractive with good noise level
customer_reviews.text: I bought the package of three. One for mother, sister and me. All three tested fine. I like the black and white design. Not a gaudy color that would attract attention if clipped to purse. Also like that battery can be replaced. Hope we never have to use them!
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent description regarding the benefits of this Personal Security Product.
customer_reviews.author: Eula Hill

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed. I checked them yesterday
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 , out of the 6 , only 3 work now. less than 6 months old. Somewhat disappointed. I checked them yesterday , only 3 worked. You really need in case of a emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Keen

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: It has a really loud signal which went off, accidentally, when I was in the bank. Works very well. I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: VALERIE GOEDERT

customer_reviews.title: Ladies alarms
customer_reviews.text: These are for the ladies in my life for Christmas stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Gave one to kiddo and my sister. I was worried about these going off accidentally, but they are made well. I've had a lot of quality concerns with Amazonm
customer_reviews.author: Sansmerci

customer_reviews.title: Effective and attractive
customer_reviews.text: A safety must have. What a great thing to gift to the women in your life this Christmas! They are loud and stylish on your keychain!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Works well and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and convenient to keep on your keychain - especially when your husband has your car keys and accidentally pulls the peg in the store. His shear panic and embarrassment in front of 20+ onlookers proved this thing is perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Ethel PA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little strength to pull the pin but it's perfect. It has a decent noise level and it is light.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: My mom loved this
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mom! These are great!! I feel like she is safer now having something that will make noise when she’s alone
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C

customer_reviews.title: Great for handicapped individuals
customer_reviews.text: Just having this device with me creates a better sense of security. I am handicapped and unable to get away if attacked. This is very loud. I believe it would deter an attacker and feel much safer having it with me in public.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good looking addition to a pocketbook and is very unassuming ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking addition to a pocketbook and is very unassuming looking. When this is activated, it emits a super loud sound.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Logan

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my daughters. They are lightweight and I feel better knowing they have this extra security with them. Fast shipping and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: I was somewhat disappointed with the sound of the ANRLUI
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat disappointed with the sound of the ANRLUI. It is not as loud as I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This seems quite adequate for my family. Thank you for the peace of mind. I hope we never have to use it, but if we do were in good hands.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.A.

customer_reviews.title: Some Defective but seller working on replacement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased many alarms that I sell in my senior community and I have 6 alarms that are defective. Seller committed to replace them when the product is available. I will change my review upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Clear
customer_reviews.text: I have one and I gave one to my Grand Daughter, I'm just hoping we never need to use them. We did try them and they are very loud.
customer_reviews.author: MyAngel003

customer_reviews.title: I have this for Just In Case
customer_reviews.text: I have had no emergency in which I have had to set it off YET. I shared one with my daughter in law, who walks alone in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca zODY

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! There is no thinking, just pull it apart to activate.
customer_reviews.author: Mimiland

customer_reviews.title: I feel protected
customer_reviews.text: These are great small alarms that make you feel safer when out by myself. Very loud but thank goodness I haven't had to use them for what they are designed for.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: perfect to keep on your key ring
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself, aunt and daughter in law,, perfect to keep on your key ring, had my son test it out, and its loud enough to get someones attention HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: susan d

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I put mine on my purse handles ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I put mine on my purse handles and 2 of my friends put them in there purses, they look great, very attractive, thanks for a great product and inexpensive too!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like these so far my only issue is that the noise could be louder. It sounds very loud in a quiet place but in the midst of a busy city with plenty of background noise it’s not as loud as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique H.

customer_reviews.title: s say I love the idea
customer_reviews.text: let,s say I love the idea, It is on my keychain in a place of immediate availability, hopeful that I won,t have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: shulamit10

customer_reviews.title: I tried the alarm and it is very loud. ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried the alarm and it is very loud. But, I hope the people that I gave these to will never have to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this product and the fact that it brought 3 so I gifted 2 of them for other women in the family. I just hope I never have to use it...
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were here very quickly, and very fashionable. I would order them again if I need some.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Meyhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great product, everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product, everything I expected. Hopefully battery life is long lasting, I only tested alarms upon reciept of. Loud and whistling alarm. Well pleased with my purchase and glad to share with my daughter and daughter-in-law. Delivery was in two days as stated. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: scoop

customer_reviews.title: Personal Alarm
customer_reviews.text: Great idea with a fashionable look. I bought six of these and have given them to my daughter, friends and sisters. They are loud and definitely get attention. They are easy to use. I would recommend this to all the women in your life. In my opinion, I would even hang one on my child’s backpack for their safety.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work. Loud enough to scare the bad guys. Gave one to all the females in my family. 8 all were pleased. My son-in-law set one off by mistake and scared the heck out of him.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: good for young kids
customer_reviews.text: i sent as a gift for my friend 's kid for walking back and for to school ....good supporting
customer_reviews.author: river girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very loud for such a small item. Easy to use, the pin goes back easily.
